you know i don't know i know we'll definitely compete and i know we should be in the playoffs but how quickly we jell and grow that takes time even the celtics they won it but they had veterans that came in with one goal and one goal only they grew during the season the pistons have been mainstays in the eastern conference finals for the last seven years or six out of seven years or whatever it is and orlando's gotten better they've been together but i know we're going to compete with all those teams for sure

just as the 17th week of the season last year bridged us over into the playoffs what training camp means to us is the opportunity to bridge forward into the new season and to put ourselves through the training camp grind if you will to pay the price to be in position to go forth into the new season realizing that no two years are ever the same and no two teams are ever the same with that being said we are excited and we are looking forward to getting the players here to having the conditioning run to getting on the field and to talking about the continuation of the improvement of our team recognizing the areas that we do need to improve in and there are many and trying to go ahead and raise the attitude the level the performance of our team consistent with winning the super bowl last february

i think last year taught us that if we stay together then anything is possible especially with four seniors and everyone that was on last year's team we take a great deal of confidence from winning in late game situations we feel like we're the best team in the country whenever the game is close and that gives us confidence even when we're not playing our best basketball or blowing opponents out we have a great deal of confidence we're going to win

i think it's good for us because it will force us to continue to get better and bring our a game every night whenever you have teams going to play their best every night it forces us to be better both as a player and as a team

i think that's been our biggest challenge so far

we're looking into every option we'll see what happens to be honest with you i want to try to go to a team that's going to win but i want to play too so if a team gives me an opportunity to play the rest of the year i'm going to take it
